Information and advice regarding the School Library Service.

Why use us?

By using the School Library Service you can

  • save time and money
  • respond quickly to curriculum demands
  • develop your pupils learning experience
  • improve the quality of your school's resources

What do we offer?

  • advice
  • project loans
  • book purchase scheme
  • support for literacy and numeracy strategies
  • talks and exhibitions
  • in service training for teachers
  • teachers' library - professional development resources for teachers
